description:
The Ninja (ranked #1) is undefeated with a lifetime record of
(12-0). The Pirate's (ranked #2) only loss was to an unknown and
has been considered a fluke to this day.
Opponents of the Ninja have only averaged 4.1 style
points per match vs. her,
the lowest of all active wrestlers! However the
Pirate in her free time has
trained and is in great condition. She is stronger and heavier and has skills. A very dangerous combination.
title: The Ninja (8-0) vs. The Pirate (5-1)
